mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_STATUS = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_GENDER, USER_PHONE, USER_STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userNickName}, #{userEmail}, #{userGender}, #{userPhone}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, EMAIL = #{userEmail}, PHONE = #{userPhone}, GENDER = #{userGender}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
